Name: God hand
Description: Card that's split into four pieces is magically put back together
Recognition option 1: The magician magically repairs split card.
Recognition option 2: The magician is able to split and put back together a card.
Recognition option 3: Without touching it, the magician is able to move the pieces of the cards further and further away from each other.
Recognition option 4: The magician places his hand over the card multiple times and each time a piece disappears.
Different wording in pilot: Magician magically repairs split card. Magician is able to split and put back together a card.

Name: Unbalance
Description: Magician is able to balance a toothpick on a deck of cards but the volunteer cannot
Recognition option 1: The magician balances a toothpick on a deck of cards.
Recognition option 2: The magician pierces the deck of cards with a toothpick, but afterwards there is no hole.
Recognition option 3: The magician lets a card picked by the volunteer appear in the card box.
Recognition option 4: When the magician starts to shake the card box, toothpicks start to fall out of the box and the cards have vanished.

Name: Healed and sealed
Description: Magician pours coke into glass from an empty can
Recognition option 1: The magician pours coke into a glass from an empty can.
Recognition option 2: The magician is able to remove the dents from the can without touching it.
Recognition option 3: The magician pours coke into a glass and makes it disappear.
Recognition option 4: Although the can seems empty, the magician is able to pour sparkling water.
Different wording in pilot: Magician is able to remove the dents from the can without touching it.

Name: guillotine
Description: The magician uses a guillotine to slice breadsticks, then asks the volunteer to put her finger in. He slices the breadstick but not her finger
Recognition option 1: The magician uses a guillotine to slice breadsticks, but not the volunteer's finger.
Recognition option 2: The magician rejoins bread sticks which the volunteer sliced with the guillotine.
Recognition option 3: The magician places the bread sticks in the bag, when the volunteer looks into the bag the bread sticks have transformed into a bun.
Recognition option 4: The volunteer tries to slice breadsticks with the guillotine, but cannot do it.

Name: Sponge appearance
Description: Magician places ball of paper in participants hand and sets it alight, revealing a red sponge ball
Recognition option 1: The magician places paper in volunteer's hand and sets it alight, revealing a red sponge ball.
Recognition option 2: The magician lights matches without touching them.
Recognition option 3: The magician transforms matches into a lighter.
Recognition option 4: The magician presses a lit match into volunteer's hand without hurting her.

Name: indecent
Description: Volunteer signs card which the magician ends up pulling out of a Ziploc bag
Recognition option 1: The volunteer signs a card which the magician subsequently pulls from a Ziploc bag.
Recognition option 2: While the magician is shuffling the deck of cards, all four aces start to appear in the Ziploc bag.
Recognition option 3: The magician puts all the cards into the Ziploc bag. After snapping their fingers the cards appear in the box and the bag is empty again.
Recognition option 4: The volunteer signs a card that is placed into the Ziploc bag, but then appears in the card box.

Name: Macro psychic
Description: Screw and bolt unscrew itself
Recognition option 1: The nut is placed on the middle of the bold by the volunteer and magically unscrews itself.
Recognition option 2: The magician shrinks the bolt, so that the nut does not stay on it any longer.
Recognition option 3: The magician places the nut in the middle of the bold and it magically screws itself.
Recognition option 4: The magician bends the bolt by hand.

Name: Finger drop revolution
Description: Magician unscrews his finger and then shakes it back into place
Recognition option 1: The magician unscrews his own finger and then shakes it back into place.
Recognition option 2: The magician claps his gloved hands, the gloves dissapear leaving his hands bare.
Recognition option 3: The magician turns his gloves into mittens.
Recognition option 4: The magician detaches his thumb, but when he turns his hands, the thumb is reattached.

Name: Salt and Silver
Description: Coin appears everywhere around the salt case.
Recognition option 1: The magician lets a coin appear everywhere around the salt shaker.
Recognition option 2: The magician changes the salt to water.
Recognition option 3: The magician wraps the salt shaker in the cloth and makes it disappear.
Recognition option 4: The salt shaker turns into a bottle.

Name: linking pin
Description: Safety pins magically interlock without breaking the seal
Recognition option 1: The safety pins magically interlock without breaking the seal.
Recognition option 2: The safety pins magically double in size.
Recognition option 3: Although there are two safety pins at the beginning, they are magically melt together.
Recognition option 4: The magician uses the safety pins to create a little star.

Name: Ambitious Card
Description: Volunteer selects and signs a card. Magician put it inside the deck and the signed card appeared on the top repeatedly
Recognition option 1: The volunteer selects and signs a card that is placed in the middle of the deck, but then appears on the top of it.
Recognition option 2: The magician shuffles the cards and places them in front of him. When he taps the card with the pen, they spread out.
Recognition option 3: The magician covers the unsorted cards with a silk handkerchief. When the handkerchief is removed, each of the cards is marked.
Recognition option 4: The magician asks the volunteer to mark the cards using the pen. After he shuffles them, the volunteer's writing has disappeared from all of the cards.

Name: 3D advertising
Description: Pack of cards comes out of a piece of paper
Recognition option 1: A pack of cards appears from a single piece of paper.
Recognition option 2: The magician folds the sheet of paper smaller and smaller until it transforms into a pack of cards.
Recognition option 3: The magician splays out the cards more and more until they resemble bunting.
Recognition option 4: The magician turns the sheet of paper which now shows a bouquet of flowers.

Name: Chop Cup
Description: balls in a cup warps and turns into a toy rabbit.
Recognition option 1: The balls magically change their location and become a toy rabbit.
Recognition option 2: The print on the mug changes from a black Q10 to a red B2.
Recognition option 3: The red balls are placed under the mug and merge to become a form a larger ball.
Recognition option 4: The magician covers the mug and the red balls with a handkerchief. When he removes it, there is a tea pot with a red lid.

Name: Color changing book
Description: The sweets from a page in a children's story book are poured out onto the table from it.
Recognition option 1: Green and golden sweets fall out of the pages of the book.
Recognition option 2: The sweets shown on the pages disappear.
Recognition option 3: Gummi bears fall out of the book.
Recognition option 4: Micky and Mini Mouse from the pages of the book are poured out onto the table as little biscuits.

Name: Bizarre Twist_ver1
Description: A card flips with a short hand gesture
Recognition option 1: The magician flips the middle card over with a slight gesture and then changes the colour of the back of the card from blue to red.
Recognition option 2: The magician reduces a full deck of cards to only three cards.
Recognition option 3: The magician places a card between two other cards and makes it disappear.
Recognition option 4: The magician transforms three cards into a full deck.

Name: Bill switch
Description: £10 note is transformed into a £20
Recognition option 1: A Â¬Â£10 note is transformed into a Â¬Â£20  note.
Recognition option 2: The note is folded so small that it disappears.
Recognition option 3: The magician makes a note out of a flower.
Recognition option 4: The magician folds the Â¬Â£10 note in a piece of paper and tears it. He reveals that the note is still intact afterwards.

Name: Ladybag magic(Paddle move)
Description: A magician has a leaf on which two ladybirds appear on either side before magically disappearing.
Recognition option 1: The magician makes ladybirds appear and then disappear again.
Recognition option 2: The magician changes the shape of the leaf.
Recognition option 3: The magician takes the leaf and turns it into a box of flowers.
Recognition option 4: The magician changes the colour of the leaf several times.

Name: insta cube
Description: The magician magically solves the rubix cube by spinning it in the air
Recognition option 1: The magician solves the rubix cube by spinning it in the air.
Recognition option 2: The rubix cube levitates.
Recognition option 3: The rubix cube turns into a ball.
Recognition option 4: The magician shakes the rubix cube and it becomes all white.

Name: Cigarette through the coin
Description: Magician pushes a cigarette through a coin and then reveals that there is no hole
Recognition option 1: The magician pushes a cigarette through a coin and then reveals that there is no hole.
Recognition option 2: The coin and the cigarette melt into another, so that the cigarette becomes metal.
Recognition option 3: The magician pushes a cigarette through a coin, but after he has pushed it through, he reveals that the cigarette is a Â¬Â£10 note.
Recognition option 4: The magician uses the coin to slice the cigarette, but it is still intact afterwards.

Name: Moving a hole
Description: A hole is hole-punched into the corner of a card. The magician then moves the hole to a different corner and then reveals that it's actually a black spot on the card
Recognition option 1: The magician punches a hole in the card. He then moves the hole from one corner to another before finally revealing that it is actually a black spot on the card.
Recognition option 2: The magician punches a hole into the card. This hole expands as the magician opens his fist.
Recognition option 3: The magician punches circular holes into the card, but after the card is turned, the punched holes have a square shape.
Recognition option 4: The magician punches a hole into the card, which then becomes a toy ladybird.

Name: Ring through the glass
Description: Magician places ring on the stem of a glass without breaking it
Recognition option 1: The magician places a ring on the stem of the glass without breaking it.
Recognition option 2: The magician places the glass upside down on the ring and covers it with a piece of silk. When he removes it, the ring is placed on the stem.
Recognition option 3: The magician puts the ring into the glass and starts tossing it around until the ring is around the stem.
Recognition option 4: The magician removes the glass and puts a ring on the stem before reattaching it.

Name: Boxes from Paperbag
Description: Magician pulls out 3 boxes with flowers in from a paper bag
Recognition option 1: The magician pulls three boxes containing flowers from a paper bag.
Recognition option 2: The magician is able to hide his whole arm inside the blue paper bag.
Recognition option 3: The magician produces a rabbit out of the empty paper bag.
Recognition option 4: When the magician turns the bag inside-out the bag folds into a paper aeroplane.

Name: Spoon bending
Description: Magician bends a spoon using fingers
Recognition option 1: The magician detaches the head of a spoon by moving the handle up and down.
Recognition option 2: The magician detaches the head of a spoon by turning the handle clockwise and counter clockwise.
Recognition option 3: The magician bents the spoon only sing his pinkie as a force.
Recognition option 4: The magician covers the spoon with a handkerchief. When he removes it, the spoon is bent.

Name: Handkerchief in Bread
Description: Handkerchief appears from bread
Recognition option 1: The magician makes a silk handkerchief appear inside a bread roll.
Recognition option 2: The magician makes bread rolls appear in his hands.
Recognition option 3: The magician holds a bread roll in his left hand, which then appears in his right hand.
Recognition option 4: The magician makes a signed coin appear inside a bread roll.

Name: Water Vanish
Description: Magician pours water into cup from bottle and then pours the water into another cup but when he tips it upside down, no water spills out.
Recognition option 1: The magician pours water into a cup from the bottle and then pours the water into another cup but when he tips it upside down, no water spills out.
Recognition option 2: The magician pours water into a cup from the bottle, but when he tips it upside down, no water spills out.
Recognition option 3: Although the magician pours water into both cups, the water bottle seems to refill itself magically whenever the magician snaps his fingers.
Recognition option 4: The magician pours water into one cup, but the other cup is magically refilled.

Name: Chinese Stick
Description: Magician pulls strings through a stick which makes the other string in the other stick move
Recognition option 1: The magician pulls string through two sticks which appear to be connected. However he then reveals thw two sticks are not connected at all.
Recognition option 2: The magician is able to join the two separated parts of the stick.
Recognition option 3: Without any movement, the magician lets the strings in the sticks dance in little circles around him.
Recognition option 4: The magician cuts a piece of string in several places and then magically puts it back together again.

Name: Wari-vanish
Description: Magician places a pair of chopsticks into envelope and proceeds to crush the envelope and its contents into a paper ball
Recognition option 1: The magician places chopsticks into an envelope, but is still able to crush the envelope and its contents into a paper ball.
Recognition option 2: The magician transforms the envelope into a Â¬Â£10 note.
Recognition option 3: As the magician turns around the envelope, writing appears on it.
Recognition option 4: The magician folds the envelope multiple times until he reveals that it is a pair of chop sticks.
Different wording in pilot: The magicians folds the envelope multiple times until he reveals that it is a pair of chop sticks.

Name: Blanc Deck
Description: Magician turns a deck of cards into a blank deck.
Recognition option 1: The cards magically change their appearance.
Recognition option 2: The magician covers the cards with a silk handkerchief. After the silk is removed, the cards are blank.
Recognition option 3: The magician shows a card and then pulls the correct card from a shuffled deck.
Recognition option 4: The cards spread across the table into a circle without being touched.

Name: Nut and rope
Description: The magician shows a metal nut and rope. It doesnÕt matter how many times he secures the nut with the rope, it always scape.
Recognition option 1: The magician shows the volunteer metal nut and rope. Although he secures the nut with the rope, it repeatdely escapes.
Recognition option 2: The magician ties a knot around the volunteer's wrist using the rope. After snapping his finger, the nut is tied in the rope, too.
Recognition option 3: The volunteer holds the nut in her hands which are then tied with the rope. When the magician removes the rope, the nut is no longer in the volunteer's hand but appears in the magician's pocket.
Recognition option 4: The magician ties rope around the nut, but is not able to remove it afterwards as it seems that the nut has shrunk.

Name: Chinese linking rings
Description: Magician links and unlinks several silver rings
Recognition option 1: The magician links and unlinks several silver rings while they keep their shape.
Recognition option 2: Starting with small rings, the magician merges them so that there are less rings in total, but they are larger in size.
Recognition option 3: The magician firstly puts the rings around his arms, but after he turns around, the volunteer has them around their arms.
Recognition option 4: The magician links and unlinks several silver rings while the rings shape their appearance once they get linked.
Different wording in pilot: The magician links and unlinks several silver rings while the keep their shape.

Name: One coin routine
Description: The magician makes a silver coin disappear and reappear several times
Recognition option 1: The magician makes a silver coin disappear and reappear several times before it is transformed into a large coin.
Recognition option 2: The magician has a coin in each of his hands. They both end up in one hand.
Recognition option 3: The magician shows a silver and a copper coin. Every time he puts a coin in his pocket, the coin appears again in his hand.
Recognition option 4: The magician ask the volunteer for a coin. Then the coin magically bends inside the closed fist of the volunteer.

Name: Impossible escape bands
Description: An elastic band visually travels from finger to finger, then it travels again even when the fingers are secured with another elastic band.
Recognition option 1: An elastic band visually travels from finger to finger.
Recognition option 2: The magician has an elastic band on his hand, which then magically ends up around the volunteer's hand.
Recognition option 3: The magician makes several star shapes using the two elastic bands and then produces a star shaped elastic band.
Recognition option 4: The magician has two elastic bands and tangles them up. They then become untwisted.

Name: Classic Disappearance
Description: The magician closes his left fit around a silk, and makes it disappear. Then, he makes it appear from his right fist.
Recognition option 1: The magician closes one fist around a silk handkerchief and makes it disappear. Then, he makes it appear in his other hand.
Recognition option 2: The magician makes a little bird figure appear under the silk handkerchief.
Recognition option 3: The magician takes a coin from the volunteer and freezes it in the silk.
Recognition option 4: The magician closes his hand around a green silk handerchief, but when he opens his hand, the silk is blue.

Name: Pressure
Description: The magician puts a mobile phone inside a balloon with a simple gesture of his hands.
Recognition option 1: The magician puts the mobile phone inside the balloon with a simple gesture of his hands.
Recognition option 2: As the magician blows up the balloon, the phone increases in size.
Recognition option 3: The magician blows up an orange balloon, then the phone flashes and the balloon turns yellow.
Recognition option 4: As the balloon deflates, the phones starts moving across the surface without the magician touching it.

Name: Chop cup
Description: The classic cup and ball routine using only 1 cup and an egg
Recognition option 1: The magician puts a ball under the cup, which then turns into a larger ball and then becomes an egg.
Recognition option 2: The magician puts the ball under the cup which then turns into an egg and then becomes a chicklet.
Recognition option 3: The magician puts the ball under the cup and makes it disappear.
Recognition option 4: The magician places a red ball underneath the cup, but when he lifts it up, it is an orange balloon.

Name: Multiplying sponge balls
Description: The magician gets the volunteer to hold a foam ball which then doubles in to two. He repeats the trick and they then turn into three.
Recognition option 1: The magician gets the volunteer to hold a foam ball, which he then transforms into  two balls.
Recognition option 2: The magician places two foam balls in volunteer's hands. The foam balls then start to jump up and down of their own accord.
Recognition option 3: The magician places two foam balls in volunteer's hand and sets them alight, revealing two paper balls.
Recognition option 4: Two sponge balls turn into a cube.
